loans.name: 11-02-06 Trường Thi Group

texts.en:
Huệ is 38 years old and she is married with 2 children. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, a urban area in Thanh Hoa province.

Huệ is applying for a loan to purchase clothes to resell. She has a retail business selling clothes. Huệ has been involved in this business for 5 years.
The main hardship that Huệ faces in her business is the lack of capital.

She is the leader of a 5-member group, the 11-02-06 Trường Thi solidarity group.  This is Huệ's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

With her business profit, Huệ hopes for her children to do well in school, for her business to do well, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase clothes to resell

loans.name: Despiner

texts.en: Despiner is married and has four children, two of whom attend school. She also takes care of an additional family member (her young brother). She has a business of selling used clothes and has been in this business for two years. She has applied for a loan of 1,000,000 UGX from MCDT-SACCO to buy more bales of used clothes. She generates additional income from selling used shoes. She works in a shop and sells on both wholesale and retail basis seven days out of every week. Her major business challenges include transportation and seasonality. She is aspiring to become an importer of used clothes and also to build her own house. She resides in the family house, which has access to electricity but not to piped water. Her monthly expenses includes school fees and feeding the family.

loans.use: To buy more bales of used clothes.

loans.name: 11-02-07 Trường Thi Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Lợi operates a food stall/restaurant selling snacks. She is requesting a loan to purchase ingredients to make processed food.

Lợi is 59 years old and married with two children. She is the leader of a four member group, the 11-02-07 Trường Thi solidarity group. Lợi does not support any dependents with her business in Thanh Hoa City, an urban town in the Thanh Hoa Province.

This is Lợi's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. She has been involved in this business for seven years. One of her most critical business difficulties is the lack of capital.

In the future, Lợi hopes for her children to find good jobs, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to remodel her house.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients to make processed food.

loans.name: Arame

texts.fr: Arame, une dame de 41 ans, s’active depuis près de 10 ans dans la vente de tissus teints. Elle est mariée et mère de famille. Elle s’occupe de sa famille grâce aux fruits de son activité et appui aussi son époux dans les charges de la maison. Compte tenu de la période, elle a reçu une commande assez forte qu’elle veut bien honorer  avant la fête de la Tabaski. Elle vient auprès de l’IMCEC pour solliciter un montant de 100000F CFA pour acheter des tissus thioup c'est-à-dire teints.  Elle se procure la marchandise à partir du Mali. Elle fait la marchande ambulante et souhaiterais dans quelques temps être propriétaire d’un grand magasin rempli de variété de tissus et d’une grande renommé.
texts.en: Arame, a 41-year-old woman, has been active in selling dyed cloth for nearly ten years. She is a married mother. She takes care of her family, thanks to the profits from her business, and she also supports her husband in covering household expenses. Given the present period, she has received a fairly large order that she really wants to honor ahead of the Tabaski holiday. She is here at the microfinance institution IMCEC to request the amount of 100,000 francs CFA to purchase some 'thioup' fabrics, that is, dyed cloth. She gets her merchandise from Mali. Hawking her wares currently, she would like to be the owner of a big store after a while. The store would be renowned, well-supplied with a variety of fabrics.

loans.use: to purchase dyed cloth to resell

loans.name: Komi

texts.fr: Komi est un jeune homme marié de 28ans avec une revendeuse et a deux enfants de 6ans et de 4ans dont un est scolarisé. Il achète et revend des friperies, des chaussures et sacs puis assure la restauration de son cafétariat à tous. Pour son troisième crédit auprès de WAGES, il compte acheter et vendre des friperies, des chaussures, des sacs et aménager son cafétariat puis réinvestir dans son activité. Il compte assurer son activité et assurer l’avenir de toute la famille. Il exerce depuis 2005.
texts.en: Komi is a young man of 28, who is married to a saleswoman. He has two children of four and six years old, one of whom goes to school. He buys and sells secondhand clothes, shoes and handbags and provides catering for everyone in his café. With his third loan from Wages, he plans to buy and sell secondhand clothes, shoes and handbags and to fit out his cafeteria, then invest in his business. He plans to secure his business and provide for his whole family's future. He has been working since 2005.

loans.use: To buy secondhand clothes, shoes and handbags.

loans.name: Ana Ruth

texts.es: Ana de 33 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos. Ella tiene un pequeña tienda con pocos productos para la comunidad. Su compañero de vida es albañil y le colabora con la economía del hogar. Para ella lo más importante es que su familia cuente con las condiciones necesarias para una vida cómoda y segura. Desea mejorar las condiciones  de su vivienda, la cual es muy sencilla y humilde. Actualmente las paredes de su casa están hechas de lodo (mezcla de tierra y agua) y bahareque, y desea construirlas de ladrillo de barro con el fin de darle mayor seguridad a sus hijos. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, hierro y cemento de tal forma que le permita hacer las mejoras necesarias de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Ana is 33 years old. She lives in her own home with her life partner and children. She has a small store that sells a few products in her community. Her life partner is a bricklayer and he helps with the household expenses. The most important thing for Ana is that her family has the necessary conditions to live in comfort and security. 

She wants to improve the state of her house which is quite simple and modest. Right now the walls of her house are made of mud (a mixture of earth and water) and wattle. She wants to build them of bricks in order to provide more security for her children. Ana is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in buying bricks, re-bar and cement, which would allow her to make the necessary improvements on her house.

loans.use: to buy bricks, re-bar and cement to build walls for her house. Presently it is constructed of wattle and daub.

loans.name: Gloria Emperatriz

texts.es: Gloria de 28 años de edad habita en casa  propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos. Ella se gana la vida trabajando diariamente en una empresa de la capital como empleada. De esta forma  lleva el sustento a su hogar.  Su compañero de vida es agricultor y colabora con la economía del hogar.  Su deseo es mejorar las condiciones de su casa para darle mayor seguridad e higiene a su familia. En la actualidad no cuenta con un espacio adecuado para el baño y para el servicio sanitario.  Gloria ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito para invertir en la construcción de un baño para lo cual necesita comprar: ladrillo, arena, cemento, hierro, inodoro y accesorios. Espera poder contar con el apoyo de FUSAI para cumplir su deseo de dar a su familia mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
Gloria is 28 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and their two children. She makes a living by working as an employee at a business in the capital. This is how she provides for her household. Her husband works in agriculture and also contributes to their finances. 

Gloria wants to improve the condition of her home so that her family has better security and hygiene. Currently, she doesn't have adequate space for a bathroom. Gloria decided to request this loan in order to invest in the construction of a bathroom. She needs to buy bricks, sand, cement, iron, a toilet, and accessories. 

She hopes that she can get this loan and fulfill her desire of providing her family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy bricks, sand, cement, iron, a toilet, and accessories to build a bathroom

loans.name: Blanca Ester

texts.es: Blanca tiene 37 años de edad y habita en casa familiar desde hace siete años junto a su familia. Ella se caracteriza por ser una mujer trabajadora, emprendedora y responsable. Blanca se dedica al comercio de tienda la cual con muchos esfuerzos ha logrado poner dentro de su casa.  Su casita es muy humilde pero está muy contenta de poder contar con un espacio propio el cual poco a poco va mejorando. Desea  construir un cuarto para dormitorio ya que su casa no cuenta con divisiones. Espera poder contar con este crédito que solicita a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos que son los materiales necesarios para la construcción.
texts.en: Blanca is 37-years old and has lived in a home with her family for the last seven years.  She is a hard-working, enterprising and responsible woman.  Blanca makes her living running a small shop which, with a lot of hard work, she has managed to set up in her home.  Her house is very humble, but Blanca is very happy to have a space to call her own.  She is improving it little by little.  She wants to build a bedroom, as her house does not currently have any divided space.  She hopes to be able to get the loan she is requesting from FUSAI so she can invest in the purchase of galvanized sheet metal, wood and nails, which are the construction materials she will need.

loans.use: to purchase galvanized sheet metal, wood and nails to construct a bedroom.

loans.name: Rosa Del Carmen

texts.es: Rosa de 46 años de edad habita en casa propia junto con  su esposo y dos hijos. Junto a su esposo se ganan la vida mediante la siembra de maíz y frijol. Además, Rosa trabaja en una finca cafetalera en la siembra y abono de las plantas de café.  Para ella lo más importante es la seguridad de su familia por lo cual desea construir un cerco perimetral de su vivienda. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de tela metálica y postes de cemento así asegurar sus pocas pertenencias y familia.
texts.en: Rosa is 46 years old. She lives in her own house with her husband and two children. Together with her husband she makes a living planting corn and beans. Rosa also works on a coffee plantation seeding and fertilizing the plants. The most important thing for her is the security of her family so she wants to build  a wall around the perimeter of her house. Rosa is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of wire mesh and cement posts in order to safeguard her few possessions and her family.

loans.use: to buy wire mesh and cement posts to build a fence providing security to her property and her family.

loans.name: Esperanza Del Rosario

texts.es: Esperanza tiene 30 años y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo e hijos.  Ella tiene una pequeña tienda de golosinas, pan dulce, sodas; que con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado adecuar dentro de su casa.  Su vivienda es muy humilde tal como se aprecia en la fotografía, pero esto no la desanima para trabajar duramente y tratar de ir mejorando poco a poco las condiciones de su vivienda y de su familia. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para construir un cuarto adicional a su vivienda, tiene la confianza que con lo que gana podrá cumplir con la responsabilidad que un crédito implica.
texts.en: Esperanza is 30-years old and lives in her own home together with her husband and children.  She has a small store where she sells sweets, sweet bread and sodas.  With a lot of hard work, she has managed to set the store up in her home.   Esperanza's home is very humble, as can be seen in the above photograph.  But that hasn't discouraged her from working hard and trying to, little by little, improve the condition of her home and her family's standard of living.  Esperanza is requesting a loan from FUSAI in order to invest in the purchase of galvanized sheet metal, wood and nails so she can build an additional room for her home.  Esperanza is confident that with what she earns, she will be able to fulfill the responsibility that comes with taking out a loan.

loans.use: to purchase galvanized sheet metal, wood and nails to build an additional room for her house.

loans.name: Magie

texts.en: Magie is a hardworking mother who raises hogs for sale. She is married and has been blessed with five children. She is requesting a loan of 5,000 PHP to buy feed, medicine, and vitamins for her pigs. This loan will help her to provide necessities and proper nutrition for her pigs. She hopes that she can achieve profitable sales out of the business she is doing. She hopes that her business will provide stable earnings for the benefit of her family in the future.

loans.use: to buy feed, medicine, and vitamins

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is from Tinago, Ozamiz City, Misamis Occidental, Mindanao: Philippines. She is 62 years old, married, and has three adult children. 

In 2010, Elizabeth applied for her membership with PMPC. Hearing all the benefits, she never hesitated to become a member. She maintains the status of being a member in good standing and repays her obligations in a timely manner.

Currently, Elizabeth is asking for financial assistance of 50,000 PHP to buy vegetables for her vegetable stand. Through this, she hopes to increase her income and expand her business. She has found assistance for her financial needs through Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative, and she is very thankful with all her heart.

loans.use: to buy vegetables for her vegetable stand

location.town: Ozamis-P2 Trigos, Ozamiz City, Mis. Occ.

loans.name: Paulita

texts.en:
Paulita joined Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative in 2009, and she appreciates the programs, services, and continuous education of the co-op. She is a member in good standing, and very active in attending the various programs and services that the Cooperative offers.

She is requesting a loan of PHP 25,000. This loan is intended to buy additional farm inputs.

Paulita  dreams of nothing more than to have a happy, healthy life, and adequate income out of her business.

loans.use: To buy additional farm inputs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tocino ingredients, like meat and spices

loans.name: Aileen

texts.en:
This is Aileen, who previously took out a 14,000 PHP loan, which she used to buy more processed and frozen meat products to expand her product inventory. Her earnings were a big help with the education of her children and with their personal, household and business expenditures.  She would like to apply for another loan, of 16,000 PHP, to pay for additional processed and frozen meat products needed in her business. The more products displayed at her stall, the better. More items to sell will result in better profits. Her profits from business will definitely help her to cover her daily needs and the educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. She faithfully meets with her co-fellowship* members every week to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy more processed and frozen meat products needed in her business.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane is 42 years old. She is married and, together with her spouse, they have two children, aged 21 and 18 years old. Her spouse also provides additional income. Jane does farming in Kangundo where she plants cash crops, such as maize and vegetables.

Jane has been in the farming business for 20 years and it has been profitable. She will be using the loan to buy farm inputs, like fertilizer and maize seeds, for planting on her farm. She will use the anticipated profits from her expanded business to buy a dairy cow and to repay her loan.

This is Jane's first loan term and she hopes to do diary farming and to educate her children to tertiary level in the future.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs, such as fertilizer and maize seeds.

loans.name: Santos

texts.en:
Santos, aged 26, is a certified organic cacao farmer. He lives in the beautiful village of Silver Creek. Santos is the last child of the family; he oversees the farm. He also takes care of his parents who are unable to do any farm work.

Santos got motivated about cacao farming on his own initiative, following his father everyday to the farm.  He manages his 1,400 mature cacao trees. Santos says that he finds challenges with pests such as birds and Wee Wee ants. He also cultivates different types of farm crops such as beans, corn rice etc.  His time is spent mostly on farming.

Santos is requesting this loan to help him in hire a worker to assist in cleaning his mature trees.  He just recently pruned the trees and due to other farm work, he has limited time to properly clean his farm.

Santos future plans are to get married and expand more cacao trees.

loans.use: To clean his mature cacao trees

loans.name: Evaristo

texts.en:
Evaristo, age 49, is a certified organic farmer from the beautiful village of San Antonio in southern Belize. Evaristo and his wife Ponthalonia raised seven children. Panthalonia spends most of her time at home with the children and she also ferments and drys the cacao beans, which are then sold to MMC.

Evaristo energetically works his eight acres of cacao trees. His cacao farm was recently pruned, so next year he is expecting an increase in his cacao yield. Evaristo states, “When I pay workers, I am able to do other farm work.” The Kiva loan has really helped him to get a lot of farm work done. Evaristo cultivates different farm crops such as cacao, corn, beans, pepitos, plantains, rice, etc. 

Evaristo’s older children are in school. Cleaning is his major concern so he is requesting a loan to hire workers to assist him in cleaning the areas around his cacao trees. 

Evaristo’s hope is to have his children take their education seriously and find a successful profession. Evaristo says that he would be grateful if they could become a farmer like him. So he provides them with a practical farm education but also provides them with the means to get an academic education.

loans.use: To clean 4,500 cacao trees

loans.name: Justiniano

texts.en:
Justiniano, who is 62 years old, is a certified organic cacao farmer. He lives in the beautiful village of San Antonio. Justiniano together with his wife Florentina raised their 12 children, of whom one still lives with them at home and is currently enrolled in high school. 

Justiniano was self-motivated in starting to plant cacao. He got married and acquired some seedlings from his father and began to plant cacao. 

Justiniano stated that he now can see the outcome of his farm work, as it brings home money. He likes everything that has to do with farming. 

Justiniano cultivates different types of farm crops. As another source of income, he annually produces 1,000 lbs of allspice. His wife Florentina has her coconut oil business, which assisted them in sending their children to school. 

Justiniano is requesting this loan to hire workers to assist him in cleaning his mature cacao trees. 

Justiniano’s goal is to stay focused on the cacao farm and to educate his youngest child.

loans.use: To clean seven acres of mature cacao trees

loans.name: Charles

texts.en: Charles is a thirty-year-old man with four children living in Masindi, Uganda. He is a farmer and also provides motorcycle transport in order to raise money to support his family. Price fluctuations and unpredictable changes in the weather affect his business growth. His dreams are to buy a taxi and venture into commercialized agriculture. Charles intends to use the loan to buy farm inputs such as fertilizers and seeds.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs, such as fertilizers and seeds.

loans.name: Khursheda

texts.ru: Хуршеда доброжелательная и трудолюбивая женщина. Она замужем и имеет троих детей. Живёт она в маленьком горном кишлаке. Хуршеда работает учительницей в местной школе. Но для того, чтобы прокормить свою семью, одной заработной платы учительницы мало. Поэтому дополнительно Хуршеда занимается своим бизнесом, она выращивает и продаёт скот. Начиная с 2009 года она сотрудничает с Арванд. Получив первый кредит, она начала своё дело, закупила несколько скот для выращивания. В данное время её активы намного увеличились, и она может покрывать все семейные расходы. На сегодня она имеет 2 коровы, 2 телят, одного быка и 20 голов овец. Хуршеда рассказывает, что после того, как она начала сотрудничество с Арванд, её жизнь изменилась в лучшую сторону и она благодарит Арванд за финансовую поддержку.  Сейчас Хуршеда ещё хочет увеличить свой доход, поэтому она обратилась в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку скота. Она надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Khursheda  is a kind and hardworking woman.  She is married and has three children.  She lives in a small mountainous village.  Khursheda  works as a teacher at a local school.  But in order to feed her family, one salary of a teacher is not enough.  This is why Khursheda is additionally involved in her own business - she raises and sells livestock.  She has been working with Arvand since 2009.  She started her business with the first loan by purchasing livestock to raise.  At the present time, her income increased a lot and she is able to cover all of the family expenses.  Today she has 2 cows, 2 calves, one bull and 20 heads of sheep.  Khursheda says that once she started working with Arvand, her life changed for the better and she is grateful to Arvand for the financial support.  Now Khursheda wants to increase her income, and this is why she came to Arvand to obtain a loan to buy livestock.  She hopes for a positive result and thanks Arvand for the support in advance.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Dushigikire Group

texts.fr:
Pascal  fait partie du groupe Dushigikire   et  habite à Bubanza. Il a 60 ans et est marié à  Georgette,  une  commerçante. Ensemble ils ont 8 enfants âgés de 3 à 12 ans dont 6 étudient.

Il  fait le commerce de  maїs  depuis  15 ans. 

C’est son premier crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il obtient, il va  augmenter  son capital et acheter une grande quantité de maїs à revendre, pour gagner plus. 

Dans les années à venir, il voudrait faire la culture du riz, et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Pascal is a member of the Dushigikire group and lives in Bubanza. He is 60 years old and married to Georgette, who is a shopkeeper. They have eight children between the ages of three and twelve, of whom six go to school.

He has been selling corn for 15 years.

This is his first loan from Turame. With his Kiva credit, he will increase his capital and buy a large quantity of corn for resale, in order to earn more.

In the years to come, he would like to cultivate rice and see his children grow up.

loans.use: to increase his capital and buy a large quantity of corn for resale to earn more.

loans.name: Alba Lucía

texts.es: Alba durante gran parte de su vida, se ha dedicado a la confección a terceros, inicialmente se involucró en este campo, gracias a una amiga que le enseñó y le ayudó a conseguir empleo  como operaria en diferentes empresas, con el paso del tiempo fue adquiriendo mucha experiencia y ampliando sus conocimientos, además pudo ahorrar y cuando ya tenía su capital, decidió independizarse y montar su propio taller para el que compró sus primeras máquinas. Hoy en día posee sus propios proveedores de producción, ha aumentado su capital de trabajo y cuenta con el apoyo de dos empleadas directas, todas trabajan de 7:00 am a 8:00 pm y elaboran ropa deportiva. De esta manera la cliente genera los recursos necesarios para aportar a la economía de su familia, conformada por su esposo y dos hijos. La prestataria se caracteriza por ser una persona carismática, enérgica y luchadora, siempre está buscando alternativas que le ayuden a sacar adelante su proyecto productivo, por esta razón, solicita el crédito para invertirlo en la compra de una máquina recubridora industrial y además comprará guías de confección, lo que le permitirá agilizar la producción, pues ahorrará tiempo en la terminación de sus productos y podrá realizar una entrega oportuna a sus clientes. Todo esto dará como resultado un incremento en los ingresos que recibe y así tendrá la opción de adquirir más encargos, para seguir fortaleciendo aún más su actividad generadora de ingresos. Alba sueña con adquirir más maquinaria y poder ofrecer nuevas oportunidades de empleo, así mejorará la calidad de vida de su familia y la de otras personas que influyen en la labor.
texts.en:
Alba has worked most of her life in the tailoring business. She got involved in this field thanks to a friend who taught her and helped her to find jobs with various companies. Throughout the years, Alba gained experience and knowledge, and she was also able to save money, which she eventually used to buy the first sewing machines to open her own tailoring workshop.

Today, Alba has her own clients, she increased her working capital, and she has the support of two employees that she hired. They all work together from 7:00 am until 8:00 pm, manufacturing sportswear. This is how Alba is able to generate the necessary income to cover the family expenses (her family consists of her husband and their two children).

Alba is known for being a very charismatic person, energetic and hardworking; she is always searching for alternatives to get her business ahead. For this reason, she is now requesting this loan, to invest in buying an industrial sewing machine and sewing patterns, which would make manufacturing more efficient by reducing production time and ensuring timely delivery of orders to her customers.

All this would contribute towards increasing her income, which in turn would allow her to accept additional orders and continue to expand her business. Alba wishes to purchase more equipment in order to offer more employment opportunities, improving not only the quality of life for her family, but also for other people involved in her business.

loans.use: to buy an industrial sewing machine and sewing patterns.

loans.name: Viet's Group

texts.en:
Viet was born in 1986; he has a child who is little, and his wife is a worker who earns about 3,000,000 VND. 

Viet has been a taxi driver for three years, and he earns about 3,000,000 VND per month.  This couple also raises chickens to earn more money. His dream is to enlarge his chicken farm, but his challenge is lack of capital to invest in it. This loan is one of the steps which will help him to reach this dream. Viet is a hardworking and careful man. 

He has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2012. In the last loan cycle, he borrowed 5,014,000 VND and repaid on time. In this loan cycle, he would like to borrow 6,322,000 VND to buy more chickens for his farm.

Other members which are part of Viet's group include the following:

Thao is 25 years old. She has a child. She is a farmer. She wants to borrow 6,322,000 VND to raise chickens.

Khanh is 37 years old. She has a child. She is a vegetable seller. She wants to borrow 6,322,000 VND to buy vegetables for her stall.

Anh is 29 years old. She has two children. She is a seller. She wants to borrow 7,630,000 VND to sell clothes.

Trung is 28 years old. He has a child. He sells fish to earn a living. He wants to borrow 5,014,000 VND to sell more fish.

loans.use: to buy more chickens for his farm.

loans.name: Saidjon

texts.ru:
Саидчону 31 год. Он обеспечивает свою жену и 1,5-летнего сына путем продажи хозяйственных товаров. Три года назад он начал свой маленький бизнес - рядом с домом поставил стол и на нем разместил свои товары. Саидчон продает фонарики, лампочки, светильники, переноски электричества, вилки для электрошнуров и т.д. 
   Зимой электричество в районе Хамадони подают лимитом. Жители района запасаются дровами и светильными приборами. Саидчон на сумму от кредита собирается купить ассортимент хозяйственных товаров, в том числе фонарей на батарейках и продать соседям, чтобы у них было светло. Саидчон заботится о своих соседях и об обеспечении своей семьи.
texts.en: Saidjon is 31 years old.  He provides his wife and 1.5 year-old son by selling household goods.  He started his small business three years ago by placing a table near his house and merchandise on this table.  Saidjon sells flashlights, light bulbs, lamps, transformers, plugs, etc.  Electricity is limited in the Hamadoni district in the winter.  The district residents stock up on firewood and lighting equipment.  Saidjon plans to use this loan to purchase a selection of household goods, including battery-powered flashlights, to resell to his neighbors so that they would have light.  Saidjon cares about his neighbors and about providing for his family.

loans.use: to purchase a selection of household goods, including battery-powered flashlights

loans.name: Francisco Luis

texts.es: Francisco de 49 años de edad habita junto a su  esposa y cuatro hijos. Él es un hombre muy reconocido dentro de su comunidad. Tiene 8 años de trabajar como profesor en la escuela de su comunidad. Para él lo más importante es su familia por lo que día a día se esfuerza por brindar mejores condiciones de vida. Desea mejorar su vivienda para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI e invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para hacer cambio de pared de su vivienda ya que por las lluvias y tiempo se encuentran deterioradas. Espera poder contar con este apoyo para hacer la mejora necesaria de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Francisco, age 49, lives with his wife and four children.  He is a man who is very well-known within his community.  He has been working as a teacher at a school in his community for eight years.  For him, the most important thing is his family.  He, therefore, puts forth great effort day to day in order to provide them with better living conditions.

He wishes to improve his house.  To do so, he is requesting this loan from FUSAI.  He will use the loan to buy galvanized metal sheeting, wood, and nails to change the walls in his house.  Due to the rain and time, they are damaged.  He hopes to be able to have this support in order to make the needed improvement to his house.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheeting, wood, and nails.

loans.name: Marcos Antonio

texts.es: Marcos  de 50 años de edad habita con su esposa y dos hijos de 15 y 12 años de edad. Toda su vida se ha dedicado a la agricultura principalmente a la siembra de maíz y frijol. De esta forma logra llevar el sustento a su hogar. Su principal patrimonio es su humilde casa la cual ha venido mejorando con mucho esfuerzo. Desea mejorar las condiciones de su casa tales como el piso y las paredes. Para esto ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este préstamo a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento y arena para mejorar las paredes que con el tiempo se han gastado y necesitan una mejora, así como el piso que en la actualidad es de tierra. Desea darle condiciones más seguras e higiénicas a sus hijos por lo que espera contar con este apoyo para cumplir su sueño.
texts.en: Marcos, who is 50, lives with his wife and his two kids, aged 15 and 12.  All his life he has worked in agriculture, primarily growing corn and beans.  This is how he supports his family.  His principal asset is his modest house which he has worked hard to improve over time.  He wants to make improvements to his house, including to the floor and the walls.  This is why he has decided to request a loan from FUSAI.  The loan will be used to buy cement and sand with which to fix his walls, which have become worn out over time and need work, and also to improve his floor which is currently a dirt floor.  He wants to provide a safer and more hygienic environment for his children so he hopes to receive this support in order to achieve his desire.

loans.use: to buy cement and sand to fix the walls and floor of his house

loans.name: Vicente Adrian

texts.es: Vicente es un hombre de 52 años de edad quien se caracteriza por ser trabajador, responsable y dedicado. Habita en casa muy humilde pero propia. Tiene 52 años de edad y no deja de trabajar ya que para él lo más importante es que su familia viva con condiciones cómodas y seguras. Vicente se dedica a la agricultura y a la pesca, de esta forma lleva el sustento a su hogar. Con el fin de mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito  a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de arena, grava y cemento ya que desea encementar el piso del corredor de su casa el cual está muy deteriorado. Espera poder contar son este apoyo y hacer las mejoras necesarias.
texts.en: Vicente is a 52-year-old man who is known for being hard-working, responsible, and dedicated.  He lives in house that's modest but his own.  He's 52 but he hasn't stopped working because the most important thing for him is that his family live in comfort and security.  He works in agriculture and fishing to support his household.  Vicente has made the decision to seek this loan from FUSAI so he can improve the condition of his house.  He'll invest it in the purchase of sand, gravel, and cement because he wants to cement over the hallway floor, which is very deteriorated.  He hopes he'll get the support so he can make the necessary improvements.

loans.use: to buy sand, gravel, and cement to improve the floor in his house.

loans.name: Jose Isaias

texts.es: José tiene  28 años de edad y habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su esposa y tres hijos menores de edad. José se gana la vida por medio de la pesca artesanal y trabajo que realiza en albañilería. Su principal patrimonio es su vivienda que con mucho esfuerzo ha lograda construir. Desea hacerle algunas mejoras a su vivienda tales como encementar el piso ya que es de tierra y desea darles mejores condiciones a sus hijos. Para esto ha solicitado este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la comprar de los materiales necesarios (arena, grava y  cemento) para la mejora del piso. Espera poder contar con este apoyo que saldará lo antes posible.
texts.en: Jose, who is 28, owns his house where he lives with his wife and their three underage children.  Jose makes his living from traditional small-scale fishing and working in construction.  His principal asset is his house which he worked hard to be able to build.  He wants to make some improvements to his house such as putting in a cement floor, since the house currently has a dirt floor, and he wants to provide better living conditions for his children.  He has requested this loan from FUSAI to use to buy the materials he needs (sand, gravel, and cement) to improve his floor.  He hopes to receive this support which he will pay off as quickly as possible.

loans.use: to buy sand, gravel, and cement to improve his floor

loans.name: Dublac Salvador

texts.es: Dublac  de 42 años de edad habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su compañera de vida y sus cuatro hijos de 15 años, 10 años, 5 años y 2 años de edad.  Él brinda servicios de seguridad en una colonia privada de la capital. Para él lo más importante es que su familia esté en condiciones cómodas y seguras. Desde hace algún tiempo ha notado que el techo de su vivienda se encuentra deteriorado ya que el agua se filtra cuando llueve. Esto lo ha hecho tomar la decisión de solicitar este crédito para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada y polines para hacer lo antes posible el cambio del techo.
texts.en: Dublac is 42 years old and lives in his own home with his partner and their four children, aged 15, 10, 5 and 2.  He provides security services in a private community in the capital city. His priority is making sure that his family is comfortable and safe. He has been aware for a while now that the roof of his home is damaged and lets in water when it rains. This is why he has made the decision to request this loan, to invest in buying galvanized sheeting and matting so that he can change the roof as soon as possible.

loans.use: to invest in buying galvanized sheeting and matting to improve his roof.

loans.name: Mastona

texts.en:
Mastona is 31 years old. She and her husband are poor people and have two children whose ages are 4 and 2 years. Mastona is very hardworking and kind-natured.

Mastova has been farming for 10 years, producing potatoes and wheat. She has a great experience in this field. She has additional income from animal husbandry. She feeds cows. Her products are sold at the local market in the region, but they are also exported.

In order to provide her crops with the needed attention and to buy additional cattle, Mastona is currently requesting a loan in the amount of 1600 USD so that she can buy fertilizer for her crops and continue improving her crop production. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for her crops, and to continue improving her crop production.

loans.name: 11-02-01 Trường Thi Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Hà has a retail business where she sells general things. She is requesting a loan to purchase more things to sell in her general store.

Hà is 38 years old and she is married, with two children. She is the leader of a three-member group, the 11-02-01 Trường Thi solidarity group. Hà supports two dependents with her business in Thanh Hoa city, an urban town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Hà's first loan with the Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women. Hà has been involved in this business for more than ten years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

In the future, Hà hopes for her children to do well in school, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase items to sell in her general store.

loans.name: 11-02-04 Trường Thi Group

texts.en:
Thắm is applying for a loan to purchase drinks to resell. She operates a stall selling beverages.

Thắm is 64 years old and she is married with two children. Thắm is the group leader of the 11-02-04 Trường Thi solidarity group, which consists of three members. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with no dependents.

This is Thắm's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Thắm has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Thắm faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Thắm hopes to build a new house.  She hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her children to find a good job,

loans.use: to purchase drinks to resell

loans.name: 11-02-08 Trường Thi Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Đại has a manufacturing business making wood furniture. She is requesting a loan to purchase materials to make wooden furniture.

Đại is 55 years old and she is married with two children. She is the leader of a 3-member group, the 11-02-08 Trường Thi solidarity group. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with no dependents.

This is Đại's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Đại has been involved in this business for seven years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

In the future, Đại hopes to build a new house, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her children to find a good job.

loans.use: to purchase materials to make wooden furniture.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en: Peter is 32 years old, married to Mercy, and they have been blessed with three children,  7, 2 and 10 months old. Peter sells spices and has been in this business for four years and right now his monthly income from the business is Ksh 35,000. He is borrowing a loan of Ksh 100,000 which he intends to add more stock of assorted spices to strengthen and add variety to his business. Peter plans to open other branches with the anticipated profit from the business. This is his third loan and he successfully repaid his previous loan.

loans.use: To add more stock of assorted spices

loans.name: Zarguloy

texts.en:
The borrower has been involved in agriculture for eight years and grows mainly corn and potatoes. She sells her crops to the people at the local market. With the profits she earns from her sales, she helps cover family expenses. She lives with her family in her own home. When farm season is over, the borrower has no other work.

She is requesting a loan to buy farm supplies to help with her cultivating activity, such as fertilizers and seeds, so she can improve the cropland to earn more income. What she sells now is not enough to cover these expenses, so the loan will help her continue covering household expenses without limitation.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and seeds

loans.name: 08-01-13-Phú Sơn2 Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Tuyết has a service business providing printing services. She is requesting a loan to purchase a computer to do printing services.

Tuyết is 42 years old and she is married with two children..Tuyết is the group leader of the 08-01-13-Phú Sơn2 solidarity group, which consists of four members. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with two dependents

This is Tuyết's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. Tuyết has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Tuyết faces in her business is the lack of capital.

Tuyết hopes for her children to do well in school, for her family to be healthy and happy, and  for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase a computer to do printing service.

loans.name: Akouvi

texts.fr: Akouvi est une femme célibataire âgée de 35ans avec 2enfants âgés de 8ans et de 3ans dont un scolarisé. Elle achète et revend des détergents, des savons, des boissons canettes à toutes personnes partout. A cause d’une mévente, elle sollicite un second prêt auprès de WAGES pour l’achat des détergents, des savons, des boissons canettes pour la revente. Elle pense à acheter de nouveaux produits pour étoffer les anciens et devenir grossiste. Elle souhaite avoir une bonne famille. Elle exerce depuis 1999.
texts.en: Akouvi is an unmarried 35-year-old woman with 2 children ages 8 and 3, both of whom attend school. She purchases and resells detergents, soaps, and canned beverages to all types of customers. Because of a slump in her business, she is requesting a second loan from WAGES to purchase detergent, soaps, and canned beverages for resale. She wants to purchase new products to supplement her existing products and to become a wholesaler. She hopes to see her family prosper. Akouvi has been in business since 1999.

loans.use: to purchase cans, detergent, and canned beverages

loans.name: Yesu N'inyishu Group

texts.fr:
Thacienne  fait partie du groupe  Irakoze  et  habite à Bujumbura. Elle  a 30 ans et est mariée à Anatole, un chauffeur. Ensemble ils ont 4 enfants  âgés de 3 à 10 ans. 
Elle a sous sa charge un enfant  qui étudie, membre de sa famille élargie.

Elle fait le commerce de manioc, colocase, banane,… depuis 12 ans. 

Elle est à son quatorzième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter une grande quantité de  maniocs, de colocases et de bananes   à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les années à venir , elle  voudrait  construire une maison et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Tharcienne is a member of the Irakoze group and lives in Bujumbura. She is 30 years old and married to Anatole, a chauffeur. Together they have 4 children between the ages of 3 and 10. She also supports a child who attends school and is a member of her extended family. 

Thacienne has been in the business of selling cassava, taro root, and bananas for 12 years. She is on her fourteenth loan with Turame. With the Kiva loan that she receives, she will increase her business capital and purchase a large quantity of cassava, taro root, and bananas for resale to increase her earnings. In the coming years, she would like to build a house and ensure that her children are educated.

loans.use: to increase her capital and purchase a large quantity of cassava, taro root, and bananas to resell and increase her earnings

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma  is a married woman with three children. All of her kids attend school, which is the reason for her hard work.  She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. 

She has operated a cashew nuts business from home for the past five years, selling to passersby and neighbours. She cited seasonality and theft as her challenges. 

With the Kshs 20,000, she wants to purchase three sacks of cashew nuts to sell. 

Her dream is to see her children get a better education, and become important people in society.

loans.use: to purchase three sacks of cashew nuts to sell

loans.name: Dilovar

texts.ru: Диловар молодой и жизнерадостный парень в возрасте 25 лет. Он женат и имеет двоих детей. У него очень дружная семья. Живут они в сельской местности. Чтобы иметь доход в семье, он пытается как-то зарабатывать деньги. Основным и стабильным бизнесом Диловара является животноводство. Он разводит и продаёт скот. В этом деле ему помогает жена. Она ухаживает за скотом, а также продаёт полученное от скота молоко. Бизнес животноводства приносит Диловару хороший и стабильный доход. Поэтому он желает расширить этот бизнес. Ему необходимо купить ещё несколько голов скота для выращивания и дальнейшей продажи. Для этого Диловар обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку скота. Он надеется, что этот бизнес будет успешно расширяться и приносить больше прибыли, чтобы качественно удовлетворять нужды семьи. Диловар заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Dilovar is a young and happy 25 year-old man.  He is married and has two children.  He has a very friendly family.  They live in a rural area.  He tries to earn money somehow in order to provide income for the family.  Animal husbandry is Dilovar's primary and stable business.  He raises and sells livestock.  His wife helps him with this business.  She takes care of the livestock and also sells the milk obtained from the livestock.  The animal husbandry business yields Dilovar a good and stable income.  This is why he wants to expand this business.  He needs to buy several more heads of livestock for fattening up and subsequent reselling.  Dilovar came to Arvand for this and requested a loan to buy livestock.  He hopes that this business will successfully expand and yield more profit in order to sufficiently meet of the family needs.  Dilovar thanks Arvand in advance for the support.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Gayrat

texts.ru: Гайрат позитивный и ответственный мужчина в возрасте 31 года. Он женат и имеет двоих детей. Он живёт со своей семьёй в небольшом посёлке. Но дом, в котором они живут не совсем  благоустроен для хорошего проживания в нём. Жена Гайрата домохозяйка, она очень трудолюбивая и заботливая мама. Сам Гайрат работает сапожником вместе со своим отцом. Для этого у них есть собственная лавка для ремонта обуви. От этого дела Гайрат получает хороший доход. Но этого дохода хватает лишь на пропитание. Но у Гайрата есть мечта, он хочет отремонтировать свой дом и установить качественные пластиковые окна и двери. Но для этого ему необходимы денежные средства. Поэтому Гайрат обратился в Арванд и  хочет получить кредит на покупку строительных материалов для ремонта дома. Гайрат надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд  за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en: Gayrat is a positive and responsible 31 year-old man.  He is married and has two children.  He lives with his family in a small village, but the house where they live is not quite set up for a good living in it.  Gayrat's wife is a homemaker and a very hardworking and caring mother.  Gayrat works as a shoe repairman together with his father.  They have a shop for repairing shoes.  Gayrat receives a good income from this business, but this income is only enough for food.  Gayrat has a dream of repairing his house and installing quality plastic windows and doors.  But he needs money for this.  This is why Gayrat came to Arvand and wants to obtain a loan to purchase construction materials for repairing his house.  Gayrat hopes for a positive result and thanks Arvand in advance for the financial support.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials for repairing his house

loans.name: Boymakhmad

texts.ru: Боймахмад  добродушный  и трудолюбивый мужчина. Он женат и имеет двоих взрослых сыновей. Сыновья находятся на заработках в России. И каждый месяц присылают своим родителям денежные средства. Боймахмад живёт со своей женой в небольшом доме в сельском посёлке. Он полон сил и желания работать на благо своей семьи.  Боймахмад занимается деканством и животноводством. У него имеется  земельная площадь, которая  составляет около 7 га. На этой земле он выращивает сельхоз культуру, пшеницу и хлопок. А его жена помогает ему в ведении его бизнеса, она  ухаживает и растит скот.  Так как земельная площадь у них большая, они также пасут на ней своих скот. Бизнес животноводства приносит хороший доход, поэтому Боймахмад хочет расширить этот бизнес, увеличив поголовье своего скота. Поэтому он обратился в Арванд, чтобы получить кредит на покупку скота. Боймахмад заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Boymakhmad is a kind and hardworking man.  He is married and has two grown sons.  The sons are working in Russia and send money to the parents every month.  Boymakhmad lives with his wife is a small house in a rural village.  He is full of strength and desire to work for the benefit of his family.  Boymakhmad is involved in farming and animal husbandry.  He has about 7 hectares of land, where he grows agricultural crops, such as wheat and cotton.  And his wife helps him with running the business by taking care and raising livestock.  Because their land is large, they also take livestock to pasture there.  The animal husbandry business yields a good income and this is why Boymakhmad wants to expand it by increasing livestock headcount.  This is why he came to Arvand to obtain a loan to buy livestock.  Boymakhmad thanks Arvand for the support in advance.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Maria Florentina

texts.es: María, tiene 28 años de edad,  es madre soltera, tiene dos hijas y reside en el municipio de San Pedro Sula. Ella inicio vendiendo comidas en su casa y hace dos años se dedico a vender ropa nueva y usada para niños y adultos. También vende productos de la canasta básica familiar. Esta solicitando un préstamo por 10,000 lempiras para comprar mas productos alimenticios como lácteos, carnes, refrescos, churros y otros para ir aumentando el inventario y las ventas. su plan es instalar bien una pulpería para vender productos alimenticios y obtener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: María is a 28-year-old single mother with two children.  She lives in the town of San Pedro Sula.  She started out selling food in her house and for two years now has sold new and used clothing for children and adults.  She also sells products like basic household necessities.  She is seeking a loan for 10,000 lempiras to buy more food products like dairy and meat products, soft drinks, churros and other items so she can increase inventory and sales.  He plan is to have a well-stocked grocery where she can sell food products and bring in more income.

loans.use: To buy more food products like dairy, meat, soft drinks, churros, etc., to increase inventory and sales and better stock her store.

loans.name: Floridalma

texts.es: Doña Floridalma, tiene 56 años de edad, es casada, tiene 4 hijos mayores de edad, ella reside con su esposo en el municipio de Choloma, Cortes. Siempre se ha dedicado al comercio, inicio vendiendo chicles, dulces y frutas. Ahora ella lleva mas de tres años vendiendo ropa nueva y usada, sandalias y artículos plásticos. Este negocio lo tiene en su casa y quiere invertirle otro préstamo para aumentar las ventas. El préstamo es por 14,000 Lempiras para comprar ropa como blusas, jeans y vestidos, sandalias y productos plásticos y surtir ya que se acerca la buena temporada de ventas. Su objetivo es trabajar para mejorar el nivel económico con su familia.
texts.en:
Flordalma, 56, is married with four adult children.  She lives with her husband in the town of Choloma, Cortes.  She’s always worked in commerce.  She started selling gum, candy and fruit.  She’s now been working for more than three years selling new and use clothes, sandals and plastic ware.  Her business is home-based and she wants to invest another loan in it to increase sales.

The loan is for 14,000 Lempiras that she’ll use to buy clothes like blouses, jeans and dresses, sandals and plastic ware to stock up since the high-sales season is approaching.  Her goal is to work to improve her family’s economic level.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Drane

texts.en:
Drane recently opened up an eating house in the town where she resides herself. She serves traditional food at a reasonable price and usually these types of restaurants turn out to be profitable because the lunch or dinner costs not more than $2 and you can find plenty of them throughout the country.

"I enjoy cooking and serving, and running my own restaurant will be a real blessing for me," said Drane.

Drane now wants to stock up on needed items for her business and she hopes that she will get some consideration from lenders in this regard. The amount she needs is a total of 150,000 Albanian Lek.

She is 51 years old and has four children, all teenagers.

loans.use: To stock up on needed items for her recently opened restaurant

loans.name: Lize

texts.en:
Lize is in her early 50s, married, and has no children. She lives with her husband in a little village. She started practicing her agricultural activity last year, and she has been doing very well according to her.
 
“I plant fodder for animals, as well as grains. I don’t limit myself to planting veggies and potatoes. I sell my produce to the locals, and I have buyers who purchase large quantities of fodder. This is an activity for both me and my husband. Otherwise it would be extremely difficult and physically draining for one person,” said Lize.

Lize wants to invest in water pipes and a tank in order to water her plants.

loans.use: to purchase water pipes and a tank to make it possible to water all her crops

loans.name: Pedro Vicente

texts.es: Pedro Vicente trabaja en un beneficio de café desde hace más de 20 años y gracias a esta labor fue adquiriendo conocimientos acerca del cultivo de esta planta y desde hace 10 años se dedica también a su producción. Junto con su esposa Ascención y sus 4 hijos trabajan en sus parcelas y de esta manera se ahorran dinero en el pago de trabajadores. El café que producen lo entregan a la “Unión Regional de Huatusco” para que sea procesado y exportado. Para la siguiente cosecha Pedro Vicente necesita realizar trabajos en sus fincas y comprar fertilizantes y por eso solicita un crédito. Pasando la cosecha a Pedro Vicente le gustaría hacer algunos arreglos en su casa, principalmente en la cocina. Entre las metas a futuro que Pedro Vicente tiene está la de comprar más terreno para aumentar de esta manera su producción y también la de poder brindarles a sus hijos la oportunidad de tener una educación universitaria.
texts.en:
Pedro Vicente has been working on a coffee plantation for more than 20 years and thanks to this work has been acquiring skills related to growing coffee so for that last ten years has also been growing it himself.  He, his wife and his four children work his land to save on labor costs.  The coffee they harvest is delivered to the “Unión Regional de Huatusco” [a coffee cooperative] to be processed and exported.

Pedro Vicente needs to do several chores to get ready for the next crop and also needs to buy fertilizer which is why he’s requesting a loan.  Once the harvest is in, Pedro Vicente would like to do some home improvements, especially to the kitchen.

Among his future plans, is to buy more land to increase production and to be able to provide his children with the opportunity of attending university.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Hanifah

texts.en:
Hanifah is married with six children and five of her children go to school.  She doesn’t take care of additional family members. She has a business selling fruits and vegetables; she has been in this business for three years. She has applied for a loan of 700,000 Uganda shillings from MCDT-SACCO to buy more boxes of  tomatoes, cabbages, onions, sugar cane and oranges.  She works from home seven days out of every week and sells both retail and wholesale. Her major business challenge includes transportation, seasonality, and perishability.   

Hanifah is aspiring of growing some of those fruits and vegetables and also to educate her children up to university. She resides in the family house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees and feeding the family.

loans.use: To buy more boxes of tomatoes, onions, mangoes, sugar cane, and oranges.

loans.name: Kossi

texts.fr: Kossi est un homme marié de 32ans avec une coiffeuse et a un enfant. Il est soudeur aluminium, répare les appareils de froid auto et exerce le métier de frigoriste à toutes personnes dans un marché de la ville de Lomé. Avec la saison des pluvieuse où l’activité ralentie, il sollicite un second prêt auprès de WAGES pour l’achat des instruments de travail de froid automobile et faire du stock des évaporateurs. Il exerce depuis 2005. Il souhaite ouvrir un autre atelier et avoir une famille développée.
texts.en: Kossi is 32 years old and married to a hairdresser with whom he has one child. He is an aluminum welder, repairs vehicle air conditioning systems, and provides refrigeration services to all types of customers in a market in Lomé. During the rainy season when his business slows down, he is requesting a second loan from WAGES to purchase vehicle air conditioning supplies and to build up his stock of evaporators. He has been in business since 2005. He hopes to open another shop and to see his family prosper.

loans.use: to purchase work supplies

loans.name: Mauricio

texts.es: Mauricio de 57 años de edad vive junto a su esposa y un hijo de 13 años y una hija de 10 años. Para él lo más importante es su familia.  Se dedica a la prestación de servicios de seguridad desde hace 5 años. De esta forma lleva el sustento a su hogar. Con el fin de dar mejores condiciones a su familia ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para levantar nuevamente la pared de su casa ya que las que tiene  están gastadas y deterioradas. Confía que con los ingresos que obtiene de su trabajo logrará pagar las cuotas mensuales que el crédito implica.
texts.en: Mauricio, who is 57, lives with his wife, his 13-year-old son, and his 10-year-old daughter.  His family is the most important thing to him.  He has worked as a security guard for the last five years.  This is how he supports his family.  In order to provide his family with better living conditions, he has decided to request this loan from FUSAI to use to buy galvanized sheet metal, wood, and nails to rebuild the walls of his house, which are old and worn out.  He is confident that he will be able to make the monthly payments on the loan with his income from his job.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheet metal, wood, and nails to rebuild the walls of his house

loans.name: Milagros

texts.es: Milagros, de 32 años,es madre soltera y tiene 02 hijos menores de edad con quienes vive en su casa propia. Milagros es una mujer que disfruta del trabajo, no le gusta estar inactiva es por eso que no desmaya cuanto tiene que realizar alguna labor. Su fuente de ingreso principal consiste en el alquiler de mototaxi, tiene 01 vehículo que compró con sus ahorros, el mismo que es conducido por un chofer quien diariamente le entrega un monto económico por tal servicio. Lleva cerca de un año ejerciendo esta función. Sin embargo realiza otras actividades que también le generan ingresos económicos como la venta de comida en un pequeño espacio en su vivienda. Todo lo que realiza le gusta mucho y no duda en poner su mayor esfuerzo para trabajar cada día con mucho optimismo, su gran deseo ahora es refaccionar otro vehículo que por ahora tiene en estado de inactividad para hacerlo trabajar y complementar así su principal fuente de ingresos. Este es su segundo crédito con Kiva, está muy contenta del financiamiento que le están brindando ya que así se siente segura de avanzar con su trabajo, por otro lado se compromete a pagar puntualmente sus cuotas. El monto solicitado de S/.600 soles lo invertirá en el pago de mantenimiento de su mototaxi.
texts.en:
Milagros, 32, is a single mother of two minor children living with her in a house of her own.  Milagros is a woman who enjoys work; she does not like being idle so she does not shrink from doing work.  Her main source of income is leasing out a mototaxi.  She owns one vehicle that she purchased with her savings.  It’s driven by a driver who pays her daily for the service.  She’s been doing this for about a year.  However, she also does other activities to generate income like selling food in a small space at home.

She likes everything she does very much and does not hesitate to put her best effort into working every day with much enthusiasm.  Her great wish at present is to equip a second vehicle that she currently has inactive to put it to work to earn extra income.  

This is her second Kiva loan.  She’s very happy with the financing she’s getting because she feels sure to make progress at work.  On the other hand, she commits to make her payments punctually.  She will use the requested amount of 600 soles to pay to service her mototaxi.

loans.use: to service her vehicle.

loans.name: Monica

texts.es: Mónica, de 32 años, es madre soltera de dos niños de 12 y 09 años con quienes vive en su casa propia. El trabajo de Mónica, consiste en la venta de cosméticos y productos de aseo personal, vende todo tipo de artículos mediante el sistema de venta por catálogo, tiene un espacio de exhibición en su casa en donde llegan sus clientes en busca de perfumes, talcos, cremas o algún accesorio de utilidad. Lleva en ésta actividad desde hace 08 años, trabaja sola y gana muy bien, anteriormente alternaba este trabajo con otros negocios como la venta de jugos o la venta de prendas de vestir que no le han dado buenos resultados y tuvo que dejar esas actividades, a pesar de ello no desiste y ahora ha visto la oportunidad de construir locales o establecimientos para negocio y alquilarlos para asegurar sus ingresos mensuales, tiene un terreno disponible y desea sacarle provecho. Por lo pronto, continúa trabajando en la venta de cosméticos y le gusta lo que hace, asegura sus ganancias con los clientes que ya ha logrado consolidar con el paso de los años, está muy contenta por la independencia que tiene y porque puede generar ella misma sus propios ingresos para solventar los gastos necesarios en su hogar. Este es el segundo crédito con Kiva, por lo cual agradece a quienes hacen posible su financiamiento para continuar con su trabajo, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado de S/.500 soles, comprará perfumes, talcos, cremas de piel, aretes, cosméticos, acondicionadores y otros productos para ofrecerlos a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Mónica, 32, is a single mother of two children who are 12 and 9 years old living with her in her own house.  Mónica’s work consists in selling cosmetics and personal hygiene products.  She sells all types of products via catalog.  She has a display area at home where her customers come to look for perfume, talk, cream or useful accessory.  She’s been in this activity 8 years.  She works alone and make good profits.  

She used to alternate this business with others like selling juice and clothes but they didn’t produce good results so she dropped them.  Despite this, she does not flag and now she’s seen the opportunity of building locales or business spaces to rent out and insure her monthly income.  She has an available piece of land and she wants to take advantage of it.

For now, she continues selling cosmetics.   She likes what she does.  She has guaranteed profits from regular customers she’s secured over the years.  She’s very happy to be able to earn her own income to cover her household expenses and for the independence she has.

This is her second Kiva loan and she’s grateful to those who make it possible so she can continue with her work.  She also commits to make her payments punctually.  She will use the requested 500 soles to buy perfume, talc, skin cream, earrings, cosmetics, conditioner and other products to offer her customers.

loans.use: to buy cream, talc, earrings, etc.

loans.name: Pilar

texts.es:
Pilar, de 38 años, es madre soltera y tiene un hijo de 06 años, vive a lado de su familia en la casa de sus padres. Su fuente de ingreso principal consiste en el alquiler de mototaxi, tiene un vehículo de segundo uso que compró hace 02 años el cual lo alquila diariamente a un familiar a cambio de recibir un pago fijo establecido como requisito. Complementa esta labor trabajando como secretaria por las mañanas en un aserradero de la localidad. Anteriormente se dedicaba a la venta de verduras en un mercado muy concurrido pero dejó de realizar esta labor por motivos de salud. Todo lo que realiza le gusta mucho y no duda en poner su mayor esfuerzo para trabajar cada día con mucho optimismo, su gran deseo ahora es comprar otro mototaxi alquilarlo y complementar así su principal fuente de ingresos. Este es el crédito numero 02 con Kiva, por tanto espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual.
El monto solicitado de S/.500 soles lo invertirá en la compra de llantas y algunos repuestos para refaccionar su vehículo.
texts.en:
Pilar, 38, is a single mother of a six-year-old son.  She lives with her family in her parents’ house.  Her main source of income consists in leasing out a mototaxi.  

She has a second-hand vehicle she bought two years ago that she leases out daily to a family member in exchange for an agreed-upon fixed fee.  She complements this working mornings as a secretary at a local sawmill.  She used to be a vegetable merchant at a very busy market but stopped doing this work for health reasons.  She enjoys everything she does very much and does not hesitate to put her greatest efforts into working very enthusiastically every day.  

Her great wish at present is to buy another mototaxi to lease out to add to her main source of income.  This is Kiva loan #2 so she’s hoping for your collaboration to continue towards her goals.  She also commits to make her payments punctually.  She will use the requested 500 soles to buy tires and some spare parts to repair her vehicle.

loans.use: to buy tires and spare parts.

loans.name: Srin

texts.en:
Living in a rural area of the Cheung Prey district, Kampong Cham province, Srin is 43 years old and married. Rice farming and raising ducks have been the main sources of family income for about 20 years. The current business earns her about 36,000 KHR per day to meet the family’s needs. 

Srin is a first-cycle client with VisionFund. She is applying for a loan of 2,400,000 KHR to buy fertilizers for her farmland. She also plans to use a portion of it to buy more ducks to raise. She hopes this loan will enable her to earn more income from her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: 08-03-15-Phú Sơn 2 Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Thiện has a service business tailoring clothes. She is requesting a loan to purchase cloth to use for her tailoring service. Thiện has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

Thiện is 34 years old and she is married with two children. Thiện lives with her two dependents in Thanh Hoa City, a urban town in the Thanh Hoa province.

Thiện is the group leader of the 08-03-15-Phú Sơn 2 solidarity group, which consists of six members. 

This is Thiện's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. The main hardship that Thiện faces in her business is the lack of capital.

In the future, Thiện hopes to buy land of her own, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase cloth to provide tailoring service.

loans.name: Aziza

texts.ru: Азиза молодая, красивая, целиустремленная девушка. Азизе 21 год. Проживает с мамой. Имеет высшее образование. Преподает биологию в средней школе. У нее очень много друзей. Ей легко удается найти общий язык с людьми, так как она сама по жизни очень общительная девушка. Азиза как истинная девушка востока мастерица на все руки. Она в свободное время от работы занимается вязанием. Азиза еще представитель косметической организации, вот уже несколько лет подряд она занимается продажей гигиенических средств и парфюмерии. У нее очень отзывчивые клиенты, и вот  наконец то она решила открыть себе магазин для продажи  парфюмерии и гигиенических средств. Новый бизнес у нее развивается на ура! Азизе хотелось бы увеличить свой ассортимент ,но для этого ей  нужны немного денежных средств . Поэтому она подала заявку на кредит. "Арванд" конечно же поможет молодой девушке. ведь "Арванд" всегда приветствует женщин предпринимателей.
texts.en: Aziza is a young, beautiful, purposeful girl. Aziza is 21 years old. She lives with her mom. She has a university education. She teaches biology at a high school. She has many friends. It is easy for her to communicate with people, because she lives a very sociable life. Aziza is truly a girl from the east, a master of all trades. She spends her free time working at knitting. Aziza is also a representative of a cosmetics organization, for several years she has been selling perfume and hygiene products. She has many responsive clients, and she finally decided to open a store by herself for perfume and hygiene products. She will develop the new business, hooray! Aziza would like to increase the assortment of products, but for this she needs a little money. This is why she is asking for a loan. "Arvand" of course will help a young girl, because "Arvand" always welcomes women entrepreneurs.

loans.use: to buy perfumes and hygiene products

loans.name: Abavandimwe Group

texts.fr:
Aїsha  fait partie du groupe  Abavandimwe et  habite à Bujumbura. C’est une veuve de  42 ans .Elle à 2 enfants  âgés de 12 à  23 ans, tous étudient. 
Elle a une personne à sa charge.

Elle fait le commerce de pomme de terre, de savon et de limonade depuis  8 ans. 

Elle est à son quatrième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  une grande quantité de pommes de terre, de savons et de limonade à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, elle  voudrait  acheter une parcelle et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Aїsha is part of the group Abavandimwe and lives in Bujumbura. She is a 42-year-old widow and has two children, aged 12 and 23, who are both students. 

Aїsha has been doing commerce in potatoes, soap, and lime drink for eight years. 

She is on her fourth loan at Turame. With the KIVA loan she is obtaining, she is going to increase her capital and purchase a large quantity of potatoes, soaps, and lime drink to resell, so as to earn more. 

In the coming years, she would like to purchase a parcel of land and see her children educated.

loans.use: to purchase a large quantity of potatoes, soaps, and lime drink to resell, so as to earn more

loans.name: Domingo

texts.es: Durante años Domingo se ha dedicado a la producción de café, alternando esta actividad con su trabajo en un beneficio de café. Su esposa Eufracia y sus 3 hijos lo ayudan para que de esta manera entre todos salgan adelante. La Producción de Domingo durante la última cosecha fue de 5 toneladas y ha resembrado hace unos meses parte de sus terrenos y espera que dentro de 2 años esté produciendo unas 7 toneladas. Para la siguiente cosecha Domingo solicita un crédito para poder pagar a los cortadores de café y para transportar su producción. Este crédito lo pagará al final de la cosecha con las ganancias que obtenga. A Domingo le gustaría poner una tienda de abarrotes en su casa para que de esta manera puedan tener él y su familia mejores ingresos para salir adelante.
texts.en: For years Domingo has made his living in coffee production, a job he alternates with his work at a coffee brokerage.  His wife, Eufracia, and their three children help out so all together everyone gets ahead.  Domingo's last harvest reaped five tons.  He replanted his fields a few months ago and expects that within the next two years he'll be producing seven tons.  For the next harvest Domingo is seeking a loan to pay the coffee pickers and so he can transport his coffee.  He'll pay off the loan with his profits at the end of the harvest.  He would like to open a grocery store so he and his family can earn more and get ahead.

loans.use: to pay coffee pickers and to transport his coffee.

loans.name: Iris Oneida

texts.es: Iris, tiene 40 años de edad, es casada, tiene 3 hijos y reside en el municipio de Choloma, Cortes. Vende sandalias, cosméticos, ropa interior, novedades y juguetes desde hace 5 años donde genera sus propios ingresos. El negocio lo tiene establecido en su casa y vende también por encargos. El préstamo que solicita es el tercer ciclo y es por 15,000 Lempiras, con el cual va surtir de mas mercadería como sandalias, ropa interior, novedades y juguetes. Con este préstamo va poder mantener su inventario de productos para aprovechar la buena temporada de ventas y crecer económicamente.
texts.en: Iris, 40, is married with three children; she lives in the town of Choloma, Cortes.  She has sold sandals, cosmetics, underwear, novelties and toys for five years generating her own income this way.  Her business is home-based and she also sells to order.  The loan she’s asking for is her third and it’s for 15,000 Lempiras that she’ll use to buy more merchandise like sandals, underwear, novelties and toys.  She will be able to use the loan to stock up on inventory to take advantage of the good sales season and to grow economically.

loans.use: to stock up on merchandise to sell..

loans.name: Luisito

texts.en:
This is Luisito, 36, a resident of Silang, Cavite City, Philippines. He is married to Lucy, a housekeeper, and is a father to his child. By the grace of God, Luisito has managed to support his child's schooling. At this time, he is working hard to continually send his child to school to finish his/her degree.

Luisito oversees operations of a jeepney (see note below) transportation business. The business has a jeepney that has a capacity of 18 persons, which pays a boundary (daily quota) each day. 

To help him continue operations of his business, he is requesting a PHP 10,000 loan. He will be utilizing the loan to buy new tires for the jeepney and to renew his registration. He expects a boost in his business income as he expands his business.  

Luisito dreams that his business will continue to grow and hopes that his child will finish his/her education. He faithfully meets up with his co-fellowship* members to share stories of his work every week.

Note: Curiously, jeepneys have purely American origins. They were first used by American soldiers helping the Philippines throw off the invading Japanese. Filipino ingenuity, however, managed to see this vehicle as an opportunity to earn, and modified the Jeep into a 20-seater jeepney, open enough to provide adequate ventilation, sturdy for everyday travel, and cheap enough to buy and maintain. Now, the jeepneys are one of the things that makes the Philippines truly Philippines.

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for spare parts and the maintenance of their jeepney unit.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es: Elizabeth, tiene 24 años de edad, esta casada, tiene dos hijos, reside en el municipio de Choloma, Cortes. Ella trabajo varios años en una maquila y cuando quedo sin empleo, decidió tener su propio negocio donde vende mercadería como ropa, juguetes, sandalias, productos plásticos y otros. Este negocio lo tiene en su casa y ha solicitado un préstamo por 5,000 lempiras para comprar sillas, ropa interior nueva, panas, canastas plásticas etc. para mantener siempre inventario y ofrecer variedad a los clientes. Su sueño es utilizar las ganancias para hacer su casa de material de bloque porque donde vive es de madera y quiere mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Elizabeth’s 24-years-old, married with two children living in the town of Choloma, Cortes.  She worked for an assembly plant for several years but when she became unemployed she decided to have a business of her own where she sells merchandise like toys, clothes, sandals, plastic ware and others.  The business is located at home and she’s asking for a 5,000 Lempira loan to buy chairs, new underwear, baskets, plastic baskets, etc. to always be well-stocked and have variety available for her customers.  Her dream is to use profits to build her house of concrete blocks because it’s currently wood and she wants to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa, de 39 años de edad, está casada con Alí quien se dedica al transporte, tiene 03 hijos de 20, 18 y 11 años de edad con quienes vive en su casa propia. La actividad que realiza Rosa es la venta de plátanos. Todos los días instala una mesa al costado de la bodega que tiene su madre en su casa, de esa manera oferta sus productos a los clientes de la bodega. En algunas ocasiones diversifica sus ventas con algunas verduras regionales como pepino, ajíes, limones u otros. Tiene más de 04 años realizando éste negocio y hasta el momento lo realiza sola. Considera a su negocio rentable ya que logra vender todos los plátanos y obtiene ganancias razonables, por tanto desea incrementar su mercaderia. Este es su segundo préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado de 600 nuevos soles, comprará plátanos al por mayor, además de algunas verduras que desea poner a la venta.
texts.en:
